Description: The process of building new information about the existing data, based on them.
The prior process of obtaining the information to generate data.
The process of defining or choosing the data structure and modeling the data into it accordingly.
The process of migrating data from a structure to another.

The process of accessing and/or granting access to data, which relies on representation and enables/powers interpretation and analysis. Visualization targets not only analysis, but communication. How to inform, how to show, how to pass on information?
